com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao.interfaces

Interface ShowtimeDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShowtimeDaoImpl

    public interface ShowtimeDao
    ShowtimeDao is an Interface class which has all the methods to query the showtimes table in the Database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly

      • getListOfCurrentShowtimes

        java.util.List<Showtime> getListOfCurrentShowtimes()
